achievement_items.name: Surgery number 1 in September
achievement_items.description: Nubia had to have a major surgery in September last year, even though she wasn't really in any state to work, she still kept in contact and helped out! What a star.

achievement_items.name: Surgery number 2 in September
achievement_items.description: Unfortunately, she had to have another major surgery in September, again she pulled though but this time when she was able to (even though she shouldn't have as she couldn't walk) she came into the office to help out! With her cool scooter

category.name: Determined
category.special_instructions: Nubia has been through the wars, but it hasn't stopped her!
